Package data

Class Classroom

java.lang.Object
data.Classroom
public class Classroom extends Object
The Classroom class models an online classroom. A classroom has a list of students, teachers, assignments and has a name. Assignments are stored as Rubrics.
Author:
Kaz Nakao

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Classroom()
    No args constructor to create a new Classroom with empty properties.
    Classroom​(String name)
    Will create a new classroom with no students and no teachers.
    Classroom​(String name, ArrayList<Student> students, ArrayList<Teacher> teachers, ArrayList<Rubric> assignments)
    Creates a new classroom with predetermined students and teachers

  • Constructor Details

    • Classroom

      public Classroom()
      No args constructor to create a new Classroom with empty properties.

    • Classroom

      public Classroom​(String name)
      Will create a new classroom with no students and no teachers. Useful for creating a blank classroom with just a name.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the classroom
      Precondition:
      Name of the classroom should have characters in it and be properly initialized

    • Classroom

      public Classroom​(String name, ArrayList<Student> students, ArrayList<Teacher> teachers, ArrayList<Rubric> assignments)
      Creates a new classroom with predetermined students and teachers
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the classroom
      students - A list of students
      teachers - A list of teachers in the classroom
      Precondition:
      Name of the classroom should have characters in it and be properly initialized. Parameters should not be null

  • Method Details

    • getStudents

      public ArrayList<Student> getStudents()
      Returns an ArrayList of students that are in the classroom
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of students in the classroom

    • getTeachers

      public ArrayList<Teacher> getTeachers()
      Returns an ArrayList of the teachers that are in the classroom
      Returns:
      The ArrayList of teachers in the classroom

    • getAssignments

      public ArrayList<Rubric> getAssignments()
      Returns an ArrayList of the assignments or rubrics that are in the classroom.
      Returns:
      A list of Rubric objects that represent the assignments in the classroom.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent​(Student student)
      Adds a Student object to the list of students in the classroom
      Parameters:
      student - Student to be added to the classroom
      Precondition:
      Student must be initialized.

    • addTeacher

      public void addTeacher​(Teacher teacher)
      Adds a Teacher object to the list of teachers in the classroom
      Parameters:
      teacher - Teacher to be added to the classroom
      Precondition:
      Teacher must be initialized.

    • addAssignment

      public void addAssignment​(Rubric rubric)
      Adds a Rubric object to the list of assignments. Will be displayed as being an "assignment"
      Parameters:
      rubric - The new assignment to be added to the classroom
      Precondition:
      Rubric must be initialized

    • hasStudent

      public boolean hasStudent​(Student student)
      Will look through the list of students to see if there is a match. A student is found if there is a student that has the same name and ID number.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object that you want to see if it is included in the student list.
      Returns:
      Whether the particular classroom has a student or not

    • hasTeacher

      public boolean hasTeacher​(Teacher teacher)
      Will look through the list of teachers to see if there is a match. A student is found if there is a teacher that has the same name and ID number.
      Parameters:
      teacher - The Teacher object that you want to see if it is included in the teacher list.
      Returns:
      Whether the particular classroom has a teacher or not

    • getUngraded

      public ArrayList<Submission> getUngraded​(int index)
      Goes through each students submissions to find which ones have not been graded yet that are associated to a particular rubric
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the rubric in the list of rubrics in the classroom
      Returns:
      An ArrayList with Submission objects that contain submissions without a grade that have the matching rubric index.

    • getGraded

      public ArrayList<Submission> getGraded​(int index)
      Goes through the submissions of a particular assignment to find which ones are already graded
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the rubric in the list of the assignments.
      Returns:
      An arraylist of submission objects thaat contains the graded submissions of a particular assignment

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      Name of the classroom

      public boolean equals​(Object obj)

      equals in class Object
